      • getFixedName

        public String getFixedName()
        Returns the metadata name if the template is resource-based or registered via the Java API. Returns the metadata name if the metadata name is not used by any other Java-registered template; otherwise returns the file name of the template
        Returns:
        the metadata name if appropriate, otherwise the filename
